channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-18607] HBase HFile write does strange things
item.description:
There's some strange code in the output handler that changes output directory into a file because Hive supposedly wants that.
If you run insert overwrite with a side directory multiple times, the 2nd insert fails
item.summary: HBase HFile write does strange things

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
